hadiths.text: Narrated Hammam:The Prophet (ﷺ) performed four `Umra (three) in Dhi-l-Qa'da except the (one) `Umra which he performed with his Hajj: His `Umra from Al-hudaibiya, and the one of the following year, and the one from Al- Jr'rana where he distributed the booty (of the battle) of Hunain, and another `Umra with his Hajj

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمِ اعْتَمَرَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: How many times did the Prophet (ﷺ) perform 'Umra ?
